General.Name: WG Tech JiangXi Co Ltd
General.Description: WG TECH (Jiang Xi) Co., Ltd. engages in photoelectric glass finishing business in China. It offers FPD photoelectric glass finishing products, and backlight module products, including traditional LCD backlights, PCB-based miniLED backlights, and glass-based miniLED backlights, as well as glass-based chip board-level packaging carrier boards and on-vehicle display products. WG TECH (Jiang Xi) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Xinyu, China.
General.Address: National High-Tech Eco Dev Zn, Xinyu, China, 338004
